We have American Literature and American language, and we should refer to our written and spoken Language as "American." If we did that, the stigma and feeling of dependence that comes with the term "English" might vanish - - I know whereof I speak, having degrees in English Literature and English History. We don't call our leader "king" or "prime minister", and we don't call our government "Parliament, House of Lords, and House of Commons," even though we pretty much copied the functions of them all. We assigned our own names, while making near carbon copies. The same should be done with the language: American Language! Then require everyone who wishes to reside here to learn it and use it....
